About Me

Stylish Portfolio is the perfect theme for your next project!

My name is Sahil, I am final year undergrad currently pursuing my Bachelor's at Cluster Innovation Centre , University of Delhi. I have my major in Information Technology and Mathematical Innovation and minors in Management and Business Studies. I am interesting in Designing, Wireframes and Prototyping, Trading, Financial Analysis, and pretty much everything related to designing. would love to work on projects related to UI/UX designing for mobile applications.

Projects

Here are some of my projects!

Kinematics model of two wheeled differential drive mobile robot

Simulating a Line Following Robot using some software's like V-REP simulator and MATLAB . So it can follow a certain path or curve.

Automatic Image Colorization

The task is to automatically colorize black and white images. So, we hallucinated a plausible color distribution for an input image using deep learning.
A Minimal Model for Glucose, Insulin and C- Peptide using Mathematica

This project is aimed at finding approximate mathematical formula of differential equations governing different pieces of the graph to develop an accurate mathematical model.
Optimal Path for School-based Application

The general problem statement for our project is through our idea, we intend to solve the problem of the safety of people that travel through school and private cabs.
